page.title: 05Housing in Tollesbury
page.content: There are many types of houses in the village. There are some council houses most of which have now been bought. There is one block of flats near the swimming pool which are owner occupied. There are lots of semi_detached, detached, terraced and a few farmhouses. There are also some houses which date back to the sixteenth century and seventeenth century. There are about three housing estates the biggest with about a hundred houses. Over the last twenty years Tollesbury has changed considerably because of new developments and more people moving in. There was also a lot of building about the nineteen hundreds when Tollesbury was a fishing village. here are some typical house prices in the area: Semi_detached... Â£30.000 detached ........Â£55.000
